content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
The structure consists of approximately 18 building blocks arranged in multiple layers from bottom to top.

## Spatial Relationships:
The structure resembles a vehicle or animal with the following components:
- Bottom foundation: Blue cubes, yellow rectangular blocks, and a red U-shaped block
- Middle section: Vertical orange cylinder, triangular orange pieces
- Top section: Red U-shaped block with yellow half-cylinder caps

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are required:

1. Block #1 (Red U-shaped block facing right) - 1 instance (bottom right)
2. Block #2 (Red U-shaped block facing left) - 1 instance (top part)
3. Block #3 (Blue cube) - 4 instances (foundation blocks)
4. Block #6 (Green rectangular block) - 1 instance (middle layer)
5. Block #7 (Yellow rectangular block) - 2 instances (one on left side, one at bottom)
6. Block #9 (Vertical orange cylinder) - 1 instance (vertical post)
7. Block #11 (Yellow half-cylinder) - 2 instances (caps on top)
8. Block #13 (Orange triangular block) - 2 instances (side pieces)
9. Block #15 (Orange triangular block) - 1 instance (right side)
10. Block #16 (Orange triangular block) - 1 instance (left side)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 3
    Step2: Move block with index 3
    Step3: Move block with index 7
    Step4: Move block with index 3
    Step5: Move block with index 3
    Step6: Move block with index 6
    Step7: Move block with index 1
    Step8: Move block with index 7
    Step9: Move block with index 16
    Step10: Move block with index 13
    Step11: Move block with index 9
    Step12: Move block with index 13
    Step13: Move block with index 15
    Step14: Move block with index 2
    Step15: Move block with index 11
    Step16: Move block with index 11
}
```

This assembly follows a bottom-to-top approach, starting with the foundation blue cubes, building the middle section, and finishing with the top red U-shaped block and its yellow caps.
